caption:
“Resting is also holy.”

Reflection:
To rest is to trust that the world turns in God’s hands. Peace is not idleness but worship in stillness.

Commentary:
This reflection teaches that rest honors the Creator. It acknowledges that we are held, not driven, by divine care.
